Plot: Hollywood movie director, Dick Dickster, is a drunk hack with a big ego and a bad attitude. He's broke, in debt, and unemployable. His manager, Sammy Davas Jr. wants to dump him as a client...
Title: They Want Dick Dickster
Writer: Nick Bird (story by), Robert R. Shafer (script by), Robert R. Shafer (story by), Robert R. Shafer
Actors: Robert R. Shafer, Tim Russ, Tim Abell, Richard Grieco
